name: part_010
file: tmp_【3D LIVE】AZKi対バン企画 LAST V STANDiNG vol.3 #LVS3【GUEST：MaiR】 [_qqd8XuHnUA]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_010.mov

scenes.description: AZKi and MaiR talk on stage after their collaboration performance.
MaiR's solo MC section, thanking AZKi and hyping up the audience.

subtitles.original: あ、AZKi先生からね、たくさん...
subtitles.english: Ah, I've received a lot from AZKi-sensei...

subtitles.original: 今、なんていうんだろう、元気もらったので。
subtitles.english: Right now, how should I say it, I've received energy.

subtitles.original: パワー、パワー。
subtitles.english: Power, power.

subtitles.original: そう、パワー、パワーもらったので。
subtitles.english: Yes, I've received power, power.

subtitles.original: もう上乗せして、次のね、自分のターンも飛ばしていきたいと思います！
subtitles.english: I'm going to add to that and blast through my next turn!

subtitles.original: やったー！
subtitles.english: Yay!

subtitles.original: もう最後まで見るしかない！
subtitles.english: You just have to watch until the end!

subtitles.original: 見てくれ！
subtitles.english: Please watch!

subtitles.original: はい、じゃあメアちゃん、頑張ってね！
subtitles.english: Okay, then, MaiR-chan, good luck!

subtitles.original: ありがとう！
subtitles.english: Thank you!

subtitles.original: はい！
subtitles.english: Yes!

subtitles.original: えー...
subtitles.english: Uhm...

subtitles.original: やっぱAZKiちゃんのね、Dream Trip、めちゃくちゃ良かった。
subtitles.english: As expected, AZKi-chan's 'Dream Trip' was so good.

subtitles.original: いや本当にね、歌ってくれてありがとう、AZKi先生！
subtitles.english: No, really, thank you for singing it, AZKi-sensei!

subtitles.original: はい、ここからはメアのターンということで、
subtitles.english: Okay, from here on, it's MaiR's turn,

subtitles.original: 皆さん、まだまだ盛り上がれますか？
subtitles.english: Everyone, can you get even more hyped?

subtitles.original: まだまだ、いけますか！？
subtitles.english: Can you still keep going!?

subtitles.original: ありがとう！めっちゃ綺麗！コメントもね、ちゃんと見えてます。
subtitles.english: Thank you! So beautiful! I can see the comments clearly too.

subtitles.original: 今日は、私たちとみんなだけの特別な日です。
subtitles.english: Today is a special day just for us and everyone.

subtitles.original: 私たちだけ、みんなだけじゃなくて、
subtitles.english: Not just us, not just everyone,

subtitles.original: 私たちとみんなで一緒に、最高の思い出、作ろうね！
subtitles.english: but together, let's make the best memories!

subtitles.original: オッケー？
subtitles.english: Okay?

subtitles.original: よし。
subtitles.english: Alright.

subtitles.original: それじゃあ、
subtitles.english: Well then,

subtitles.original: 早速1曲目、歌いたいと思います。
subtitles.english: I'd like to sing the first song right away.

subtitles.original: 聴いてください。
subtitles.english: Please listen.

subtitles.original: GROUND-ZERO。
subtitles.english: GROUND-ZERO.

subtitles.original: 解き放て　世界へ
subtitles.english: Set it free, to the world

subtitles.original: LVS、ガンガン行こうぜー！
subtitles.english: LVS, let's go all out!

subtitles.original: 解ききれない闇を行く
subtitles.english: Going through the unbreakable darkness

subtitles.original: 希望の灯が消えたら　その時が幕開け
subtitles.english: When the fire of hope goes out, that's the beginning

subtitles.original: 思い描いた何もかも
subtitles.english: Everything I envisioned

subtitles.original: その目で確かめるために　あの壁を打ち砕け Blow up!
subtitles.english: To see it with those eyes, smash that wall, Blow up!

subtitles.original: Hurry up
subtitles.english: Hurry up

subtitles.original: Wanna journey start now
subtitles.english: Wanna journey start now

subtitles.original: 魂と生命で Knock out!
subtitles.english: With all my heart and soul, Knock out!

subtitles.original: Kick back　確定も不確定も　抱えたままで
subtitles.english: Kick back, keeping both certainty and uncertainty

subtitles.original: 目指す場所は　ひとつだけ
subtitles.english: The place I'm aiming for is only one

subtitles.original: - hope you take me out...
subtitles.english: - hope you take me out...

subtitles.original: 走り出せ　この手を伸ばせば
subtitles.english: Start running, if I reach out this hand

subtitles.original: 夢に届くかな
subtitles.english: Will I reach my dream?

subtitles.original: 胸に刻んだ今が　グラウンド・ゼロ
subtitles.english: The present engraved in my heart is Ground Zero

subtitles.original: 焦げ付くほどに　勇気を燃やして
subtitles.english: Burning courage enough to scorch

subtitles.original: 流れ星に重なる　軌道を描くよ
subtitles.english: Drawing an orbit that overlaps with shooting stars

subtitles.original: 向かい風に傷付いても
subtitles.english: Even if I'm hurt by the headwind

subtitles.original: 止まらずに進め！！
subtitles.english: Proceed without stopping!!

subtitles.original: Are you ready?
subtitles.english: Are you ready?

subtitles.original: Let's get ready to break some wall
subtitles.english: Let's get ready to break some wall

subtitles.original: Come on!
subtitles.english: Come on!

subtitles.original: EXPLOSION!
subtitles.english: EXPLOSION!

subtitles.original: 未来を指した　あの場所から
subtitles.english: From that place that pointed to the future

subtitles.original: 私のブレーキは　壊れていたんだ
subtitles.english: My brakes were broken

subtitles.original: クレッシェンドが止まらない　振り返らない
subtitles.english: The crescendo doesn't stop, I won't look back

subtitles.original: - can you set me free...?
subtitles.english: - can you set me free...?

subtitles.original: 解き放て　流した涙の
subtitles.english: Set it free, of the tears I shed

subtitles.original: 欠片握りしめ
subtitles.english: Clutching the fragments

subtitles.original: 駆け抜けてゆく　後悔なんて知らないまま
subtitles.english: Running through, without knowing any regrets

subtitles.original: 信じることを　恐れたとしても
subtitles.english: Even if I'm afraid to believe

subtitles.original: 秘めた情熱は　だって抑えきれないから
subtitles.english: Because the hidden passion can't be suppressed

subtitles.original: 破裂しそうな　想いだけが
subtitles.english: Only the feelings that are about to burst

subtitles.original: 揺るぎない真実
subtitles.english: Are the unwavering truth

subtitles.original: もっとずっと遠くへ
subtitles.english: Further and further away

subtitles.original: 銀河さえ超えて
subtitles.english: Beyond even the galaxy

subtitles.original: 未来まで
subtitles.english: Until the future

subtitles.original: この物語に　最高の結末を
subtitles.english: The best ending to this story

subtitles.original: 願い遂げるために　すべてを捧げよう
subtitles.english: I'll give everything to fulfill my wish

subtitles.original: 崩れ去る前に
subtitles.english: Before it crumbles away

subtitles.original: この手を伸ばせば　夢に届くかな
subtitles.english: If I reach out this hand, will I reach my dream?

subtitles.original: 胸に刻んだ今が　グラウンド・ゼロ
subtitles.english: The present engraved in my heart is Ground Zero

subtitles.original: 焦げ付くほどに　勇気を燃やして
subtitles.english: Burning courage enough to scorch

subtitles.original: 流れ星に重なる　軌道を描くよ
subtitles.english: Drawing an orbit that overlaps with shooting stars

subtitles.original: 向かい風に傷付いても
subtitles.english: Even if I'm hurt by the headwind

subtitles.original: 止まらずに進め！！
subtitles.english: Proceed without stopping!!
